ol.title: To Delete a Shortcut:

li.p: In the File Management menu group, click File List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: If the shortcut you want to delete appears in the Directory Contents column, continue with the next step. If the shortcut you want to delete does not appear in the Directory Contents column, click the name of the directory that contains the shortcut. The contents of that directory appear.
Select the checkbox for the shortcut you want to delete.
Click Delete. A dialog box appears, asking if you are sure you want to delete the selected items.
Click OK. The window refreshes with a message informing you that the files were successfully deleted.
